ModMetaData.name: Pawn Badge - Bigrez HD Icons 1.4
ModMetaData.author: Bigredz
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a wide variety of HD high-contrast job icons for use with SaucyPigeon's forked Pawn Badge mod.
Jobs are grouped and color coded:
Yellow = Dumb Labor Orange = Skilled Worker Dark Blue = Social Pink = Craft Light Blue = Tech Red = Combat Green = Gather, Purple = Psycast / Rimworld of Magic
As an added bonus, I also added tactical unit icons from Valkyrie Chronicles.
